name: Sheet Pan Easy Fajitas
preparation: In a small bowl combine oil and Fajita Seasoning. Season with Salt and Pepper, if desired.
Toss chicken, veggies, and oil mixture together on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner and spread out evenly.
Bake for 20–25 minutes until chicken is cooked and the veggies are soft.
Serve with tortillas and your favorite fixings.
tips: 1 recipe, 2 ways:  Make it fast in your microwave: Easy Fajitas  Fix it and forget it in your slow cooker: Slow Cooker Easy Fajitas
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 3 tbsp prepared Guacamole, 1⁄4 cup prepared Poco Picante Salsa, 1 cup mixed veggies, in season, your choice

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
